translated: Homage to the glorious Mañjughoṣa.

original: phung po lnga ni /
analyzed: phung po lnga ni /

analyzed: de la gzugs kyi phung po ni bco lnga ste /

analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / des rgyur byas pa'i gzugs bcu gcig go //

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni /
translated: The four great elements are:

original: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams so //
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams so //
translated: the earth element, the water element, the fire element, and the wind element.

original: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni /
analyzed: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni /
translated: The forms derived from the great elements are:

original: mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o //
translated: the eye faculty, the ear faculty, the nose faculty, the tongue faculty, the body faculty, form, sound, smell, taste, and the tangible that is not an indication.

original: @289b tshor ba'i phung po ni gsum ste /
analyzed: @289b tshor ba'i phung po ni gsum ste /
translated: The aggregate of feeling is threefold:

original: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / gnyi ga ma yin pa rnams so //
analyzed: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / gnyi ga ma yin pa rnams so //
translated: pleasant, unpleasant, and neither pleasant nor unpleasant.

original: 'du shes kyi phung po yang gsum ste /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi phung po yang gsum ste /
translated: The aggregate of perception is also threefold:

original: chung ngu dang / rgya chen por gyur pa dang / tshad med pa'o /
analyzed: chung ngu dang / rgya chen por gyur pa dang / tshad med pa'o /
translated: small, large, and immeasurable.

original: 'du byed kyi phung po ni sems las byung ba'i 'du byed lnga bcu rtsa gcig dang / sems dang mi ldan pa bcu bzhi'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po ni sems las byung ba'i 'du byed lnga bcu rtsa gcig dang / sems dang mi ldan pa bcu bzhi'o //
translated: The aggregate of formations is fifty-one mental factors and fourteen non-mental factors.

original: sems las byung ba'i 'du byed ni reg pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang ldan ni kun du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: sems las byung ba'i 'du byed ni reg pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang ldan ni kun du 'gro ba'o //
translated: The mental factors are contact, attention, feeling, perception, volition, and the universal mental factors.

original: 'dun pa dang / mos pa dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab ni yul so sor nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pa dang / mos pa dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab ni yul so sor nges pa'o //
translated: Resolve, faith, mindfulness, concentration, and wisdom are the five that are certain with regard to their object.

original: dad pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / ma chags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / zhes dang med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / gti mug med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
analyzed: dad pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / ma chags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / zhes dang med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / gti mug med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
translated: Faith, shame, embarrassment, the root of the wholesome nongreed, the root of the wholesome nonhatred, the root of the wholesome nondelusion, vigor, suppleness,

original: bag yod pa dang / btang snyoms dang / rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang bcu gcig po 'di ni dge ba'o //
analyzed: bag yod pa dang / btang snyoms dang / rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang bcu gcig po 'di ni dge ba'o //
translated: conscientiousness, equanimity, and nonviolence are the eleven that are wholesome.

analyzed: 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / the tshom dang drug ni nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: Desire, hatred, pride, ignorance, views, and doubt are the six that are afflictions.

original: khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / g-yo dang / sgyu dang / rgyags pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa dang /
analyzed: khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / g-yo dang / sgyu dang / rgyags pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa dang /
translated: anger, enmity, dissimulation, spite, jealousy, avarice, deceit, guile, arrogance, violence, shamelessness, lack of abashment,

original: rmugs pa dang / rgod pa dang / ma dad pa dang / le lo dang / bag med pa dang / brjed ngas pa dang / rnam par g-yeng ba dang / shes bzhin ma yin pa dang nyi shu ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'o //
analyzed: rmugs pa dang / rgod pa dang / ma dad pa dang / le lo dang / bag med pa dang / brjed ngas pa dang / rnam par g-yeng ba dang / shes bzhin ma yin pa dang nyi shu ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: sloth, excitedness and sense of guilt, lack of faith, laziness, negligence, forgetfulness, distraction, and lack of awareness.

original: 'gyod pa dang / gnyid dang / rtog pa dang / dpyod pa ste /
analyzed: 'gyod pa dang / gnyid dang / rtog pa dang / dpyod pa ste /
translated: Regret, sleep, initial mental application, and discursive thought.

original: bzhi po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bzhi po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: These four are variable.

original: de la lnga ni kun du 'gro ba'o//
analyzed: de la lnga ni kun du 'gro ba'o//
translated: Among them, five are omnipresent.

original: lnga ni yul so sor nges pa'o //
analyzed: lnga ni yul so sor nges pa'o //
translated: Five are object-determining.

original: bcu gcig ni dge ba'o //
analyzed: bcu gcig ni dge ba'o //
translated: Eleven are virtuous.

original: drug ni nyon mongs pa'o //
analyzed: drug ni nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: Six are root afflictions.

original: nyi shu ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'o //
analyzed: nyi shu ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: Twenty are secondary afflictions.

original: bzhi ni gzhan du'ang 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: bzhi ni gzhan du'ang 'gro ba'o //
translated: Four are variable.

original: de la nga rgyal ni rnam pa bdun te /
analyzed: de la nga rgyal ni rnam pa bdun te /
translated: There are seven types of pride:🔽pride, overweening pride, excessive pride,🔽wrong pride, inordinate pride,

original: nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / chud zas snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal lo //
analyzed: nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / chud zas snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal lo //
translated: pride of inferiority, and simulated pride.

original: lta ba'i rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: lta ba'i rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: There are five types of views:🔽the view of the transitory aggregates, extreme views,

original: 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang / log par lta ba dang / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o //🔽sems dang ldan pa @290a * //
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang / log par lta ba dang / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o // sems dang ldan pa @290a * //
translated: erroneous views, esteeming views, and esteeming morality and asceticism.

original: ma yin pa'i 'du byed ni gzugs dang / sems dang sems las 'byung ba'i gnas skabs la gdags te /
analyzed: ma yin pa'i 'du byed ni gzugs dang / sems dang sems las 'byung ba'i gnas skabs la gdags te /
translated: The mental factors not associated with mind are designated in relation to the states of form, mind, and mental factors.

original: thob pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la 'du shes med pa dang / srog gi dbang po dang / rigs mthun pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
analyzed: thob pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la 'du shes med pa dang / srog gi dbang po dang / rigs mthun pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
translated: the faculty of life force,🔽similarity of type,🔽birth, aging,🔽endurance, impermanence,🔽the collection of names, the collection of phrases, the collection of letters,

original: gnas pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / ming gi tshegs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs dang / so so'i skye bo nyid dang / de lta bu'i cha dang mthun pa rnams so //🔽rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams so /🔽rnam par shes pa brgyad de /
analyzed: gnas pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / ming gi tshegs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs dang / so so'i skye bo nyid dang / de lta bu'i cha dang mthun pa rnams so // rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams so / rnam par shes pa brgyad de /
translated: the state of being an ordinary being, and those that are similar to those.🔽The aggregate of consciousness is the eight consciousnesses.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa brgyad de /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa brgyad de /
translated: There are eight consciousnesses:🔽eye consciousness,🔽ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, mental consciousness, afflicted mentality,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rnam ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rnam ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang /
translated: and foundation consciousness.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The basis is the store-consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dbang po ni rnam par shes pa drug po 'gags ma thag pa'o /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dbang po ni rnam par shes pa drug po 'gags ma thag pa'o /
translated: The faculty of the mental consciousness is the immediately past state of the six consciousnesses.

original: yul ni brgyad de /
analyzed: yul ni brgyad de /
translated: The objects are eightfold:

original: tshor ba dang/'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas nam mkha' dang / so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang / so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang / de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: tshor ba dang/'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas nam mkha' dang / so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang / so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang / de bzhin nyid do //
translated: feeling, conceptualization, volition, non-informative form, unconditioned space, non-analytical cessation, analytical cessation, and reality.

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi 'khor bzhi ni /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi 'khor bzhi ni /
translated: The four circles of the afflicted mind are:

original: bdag tu rmongs pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag tu nga rgyal ba dang / bdag tu chags pa'o //
analyzed: bdag tu rmongs pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag tu nga rgyal ba dang / bdag tu chags pa'o //
translated: delusion of self, view of self, pride of self, and attachment to self.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: The store-consciousness is:

original: sa bon thams cad kyi gzhi nyid dang / lus kyi kun gzhi dang / rgyu nyid dang / lus la gnas pa nyid dang / dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa dang / ris gcig pa dang / rgyun chags par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon thams cad kyi gzhi nyid dang / lus kyi kun gzhi dang / rgyu nyid dang / lus la gnas pa nyid dang / dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa dang / ris gcig pa dang / rgyun chags par 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is the basis of all seeds, the all-base of the body, the cause, the state of abiding in the body, the object and aspect that are not fully determined, the single class, and the continuous engagement.

original: skye mched bcu gnyis ni /
analyzed: skye mched bcu gnyis ni /
translated: The twelve sense bases are:🔽The sense base of the eye,

original: mig gi skye mched dang / rna ba'i /
analyzed: mig gi skye mched dang / rna ba'i /
translated: the sense base of the ear,

original: sna'i / lce'i /
analyzed: sna'i / lce'i /
translated: the sense base of the nose,🔽the sense base of the tongue,

original: lus kyi / yid kyi /
analyzed: lus kyi / yid kyi /
translated: the sense base of the body, and the sense base of the mind;🔽the sense base of form,

original: gzugs kyi / sgra'i /
analyzed: gzugs kyi / sgra'i /
translated: the sense base of sound,

original: dri'i / ro'i /
analyzed: dri'i / ro'i /
translated: the sense base of smell,🔽the sense base of taste,

original: reg bya'i / chos kyi skye mched do //
analyzed: reg bya'i / chos kyi skye mched do //
translated: the sense base of touch, and the sense base of phenomena.

original: khams bco brgyad ni /
analyzed: khams bco brgyad ni /
translated: The eighteen constituents are:

original: mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba /
analyzed: mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba /
translated: The eye constituent, the form constituent, and the eye consciousness constituent; the ear,

original: sna / lce /
analyzed: sna / lce /
translated: nose, tongue,

original: lus / yid /
analyzed: lus / yid /
translated: body, and mind;

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: and the consciousness constituents.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni /
translated: Dependent origination is:

original: phyi'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: phyi'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o //
translated: External dependent origination and internal dependent origination.

original: phyi'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba @290b ni sa bon las ni myu gu /🔽myu gu las 'dab ma /🔽'dab ma las sdong bu /
analyzed: phyi'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba @290b ni sa bon las ni myu gu / myu gu las 'dab ma / 'dab ma las sdong bu /
translated: The external dependent origination is as follows: from a seed, a sprout;🔽from the sprout, a leaf;🔽from the leaf, a stem;

original: sdong bu las sbu gu /🔽sbu gu las snying po //
analyzed: sdong bu las sbu gu / sbu gu las snying po //
translated: from the stem, a hollow stalk;🔽from the hollow stalk, a flower bud;

original: snying po las me tog /
analyzed: snying po las me tog /
translated: from the flower bud, a flower;

original: me tog las 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: me tog las 'bras bu'o //
translated: and from the flower, a fruit.

original: rkyen drug ste /
analyzed: rkyen drug ste /
translated: There are six conditions:

original: sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / dus kyi khams rnams so //
analyzed: sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / dus kyi khams rnams so //
translated: the elements of earth, water, fire, wind, space, and time.

original: nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The internal dependent origination is as follows:

original: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed /
translated: Conditioned by ignorance, there are compositional factors;

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
translated: conditioned by compositional factors, there is consciousness;

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
translated: conditioned by consciousness, there is name and form;🔽conditioned by name and form, there are the six sense spheres;

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /🔽reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa / reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
translated: conditioned by the six sense spheres, there is contact;🔽conditioned by contact, there is feeling;

original: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sreg pa /
analyzed: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sreg pa /
translated: conditioned by feeling, there is craving;

original: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
analyzed: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
translated: conditioned by craving, there is grasping;

original: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
analyzed: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
translated: conditioned by grasping, there is becoming;

original: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
analyzed: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
translated: Existence is the condition for birth.

original: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams 'byung ste /

translated: Birth is the condition for aging and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, despair, and distress.

original: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, this whole great mass of suffering comes into being.

original: de la ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag / rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag / ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag / skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa /
analyzed: de la ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag / rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag / ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag / skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa /
translated: “Here, through the cessation of ignorance, formations cease. Through the cessation of formations, consciousness ceases. Through the cessation of consciousness, name and form cease. original: reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba /
analyzed: reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba /
translated: Through the cessation of contact, sensation ceases.

original: tshor sa 'gags pas sred pa /🔽sred pa 'gags las len pa /
analyzed: tshor sa 'gags pas sred pa / sred pa 'gags las len pa /
translated: Through the cessation of sensation, craving ceases.🔽Through the cessation of craving, grasping ceases.

original: len pa 'gags pas srid pa /
analyzed: len pa 'gags pas srid pa /
translated: Through the cessation of grasping, becoming ceases.

original: srid pa 'gags pas skye pa /
analyzed: srid pa 'gags pas skye pa /
translated: Through the cessation of becoming, birth ceases.

original: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te /

translated: dejection, and strife cease.

original: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, this entire great mass of suffering ceases.

original: rkyen ni khams drug ste /
analyzed: rkyen ni khams drug ste /
translated: The conditions are the six elements:

original: sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: earth, water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness.

original: de dag kyang rnam pa lngar pa lta ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang rnam pa lngar pa lta ste /

analyzed: dbang po lnga ni /
